verses.roman:
śrī-raṅga-purī saha tāhāñi milana
rāma-dāsa viprera kaila duḥkha-vimocana

synonyms: śrī-raṅga-purī—of the name Śrī Raṅga-purī; saha—with; tāhāñi—there; milana—meeting; rāma-dāsa—of the name Rāmadāsa; viprera—of the brāhmaṇa; kaila—did; duḥkha-vimocana—deliverance from all sufferings.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then met Śrī Raṅgapurī and mitigated all the sufferings of a brāhmaṇa named Rāmadāsa.
